amendment.description: An amendment numbered 8 printed in Part B of House Report 116-2 to increase funding by $50 million for the Community Development Fund to help address unmet infrastructure needs for grantees that received allocations for disasters that occurred in 2017.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Thompson (CA) amendment (A008) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Thompson (CA) amendment (A008) Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A008) offered by Mr. Thompson (CA).
